meanings.definition: The quality of being intelligent or quick-witted.
meanings.sent1: Her cleverness in solving puzzles amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: His cleverness in coming up with solutions to problems is truly impressive.
meanings.sent3: The cleverness of the squirrel in finding hidden nuts was quite entertaining to watch.
meanings.sent4: The cleverness of the magician's tricks left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent5: The cleverness of the detective in solving the case made him a legend in the town.

meanings.sent1: The inventor's cleverness in creating new gadgets revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent2: Her cleverness in designing innovative solutions set her apart from others.
meanings.sent3: The cleverness of the chef in combining unexpected flavors resulted in a delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: The cleverness of the architect's design amazed everyone who saw it.
meanings.sent5: The cleverness of the engineer in solving complex problems was truly remarkable.
